section.heading: Effects of transfer of structured settlement payment rights

content.p: The transferee shall be liable to the structured settlement\nobligor and the annuity issuer:\n

if the transfer contravenes the terms of the structured
settlement, for any taxes incurred by such parties as a consequence of
the transfer; and
 (ii) for any other liabilities or costs, including reasonable costs
and attorneys' fees, arising from compliance by such parties with the
order of the court or arising as a consequence of the transferee's
failure to comply with this title;

Neither the annuity issuer nor the structured settlement obligor
may be required to divide any periodic payment between the payee and any
transferee or assignee or between two or more transferees or assignees;
and

Any further transfer of structured settlement payment rights by
the payee may be made only after compliance with all of the requirements
of this title.
